      • colors

        private java.util.HashMap<java.util.logging.Level,​java.lang.String> colors
        Colors of the table entries corresponding to the logging levels. In the format of css color styling e.g. #ffffff is white. #ff0000 is red. etc

    • Method Detail

      • getHead

        public java.lang.String getHead​(java.util.logging.Handler handler)
        Get header. Just a bunch of equal signs and the date and time.

        e.g. "================================================[Mon Jan 01 12:05:30 PST 2020]================================================" Similar format used for HTML

        Overrides:
        getHead in class java.util.logging.Formatter
        Parameters:
        handler - Handler
        Returns:
        Date and time

      • getTail

        public java.lang.String getTail​(java.util.logging.Handler handler)
        No tail. Returns empty string.
        Overrides:
        getTail in class java.util.logging.Formatter
        Parameters:
        handler - Handler
        Returns:
        Empty string

      • format

        public java.lang.String format​(java.util.logging.LogRecord record)
        Formats logs in the following format: "[yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss] [threadID] [sourceClass|sourceMethod] [LOG LEVEL]: MESSAGE\n" e.g. "[2020-01-01 12:05:30] [Thread-16] [io.github.jgame.logging.GenericFormatter|testLogMessage] [INFO]: Test message\n" Similar format used for HTML
        Specified by:
        format in class java.util.logging.Formatter
        Parameters:
        record - LogRecord
        Returns:
        String

      • formatHTML

        private java.lang.String formatHTML​(java.lang.Throwable e)
        Get the HTML for the exception. Just a red table entry with white text containing the {@link GenericLogger}.getStackTrace() of the throwable
        Parameters:
        e - Throwable
        Returns:
        formatted string (in HTML)
